name: Gowajee.ai | Enterprise-grade speech & language AI technologies

children.name: Welcome to Gowajee.ai ("we," "us," "our"). This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our AI auto speech recognition platform ("the Platform"). By accessing or using the Platform, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.
When you create an account or use our Platform, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and other contact details.
We do not store your audio data and we just process the audio data you submit to the Platform for transcription and analysis.
We may collect information about how you interact with the Platform, such as your IP address, browser type, device information, and usage patterns.
We use the information you provide to deliver and improve our services.
We may use your contact information to send you updates, announcements, and promotional materials related to our services. and analysis.
We may use aggregated and anonymized data for analytical purposes to improve the Platform's performance and user experience.
We may disclose your information as required by law, regulation, or legal process.
We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
We retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy and as required by law.
You can access and update your personal information through your account settings on the Platform.
You can opt-out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the instructions provided in our emails or by contacting us directly.
Our Platform is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors.
We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy as our practices evolve. We will notify you of any material changes through the Platform or by other means.
If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding your personal information or this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
